item.title: Ancient Philosophy Study Guide
item.description: What is the reason for separating Plato’s dialogues into Socratic (early) and Platonic (middle) dialogues? Why is Socratesâ€™ method primarily negative? Is there anything that Socrates does (at least implicitly) claim to know? Explain why the Meno is considered a transitional dialogue. Explain Meno’s Paradox. How does Plato respond? Although Socrates claims ignorance, he seems to hold some surprising philosophical positions. Explain. Why did Socrates not plead for his life?
